description: Enterprise techniques used by Winnti for Windows, ATT&CK software S0141 v2.0
name: Winnti for Windows (S0141)

techniques.comment: Winnti for Windows sets its DLL file as a new service in the Registry to establish persistence.[2]
A Winnti for Windows implant file was named ASPNET_FILTER.DLL, mimicking the legitimate ASP.NET ISAPI filter DLL with the same name.[2]
The Winnti for Windows installer loads a DLL using rundll32.[2]
